pr_title: minor: Add input file for Java14 instanceof with pattern matching (#7290)

timeline.message: Issue #7290: Add input file for Java14 instanceof with pattern matching

timeline.bodyText:
There should be non-compiled marker. See
https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/src/test/resources-noncompilable/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/grammar/java9/InputJava9TryWithResources.java#L1 for reference
timeline.author: pbludov

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/test/resources-noncompilable/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/grammar/java14/InputJava14InstanceofWithPatternMatching.java b/src/test/resources-noncompilable/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/grammar/java14/InputJava14InstanceofWithPatternMatching.java
index 9a0746d6c..8fa3eba3a 100644
--- a/src/test/resources-noncompilable/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/grammar/java14/InputJava14InstanceofWithPatternMatching.java
+++ b/src/test/resources-noncompilable/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/grammar/java14/InputJava14InstanceofWithPatternMatching.java

@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: Compilable with Java14
 package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.grammar.java14;
 
 import java.util.Arrays;
